channel.title: How to make fullscreen,hd,annnd control panel(and grand exchange if you can)
channel.description: Hey guys using delta 317.Need fullscreen,hd,and control panel.Grand exchange would be helpful.Used combatscape source,will rep++ for anyone who helps,and you get admin on my server Please please help :D

item.title: How to make fullscreen,hd,annnd control panel(and grand exchange if you can)
item.dc:creator: @i_str_pk_i i str pk i
item.description:
@i_str_pk_i wrote:

Add some HD models, G.E. there is kinda a way (there is a tut on mopar) that make u add items to a list and then u can se what he sells + price + who,There is also a tutorial for control panel (use search bar).

Read full topic
item.source: How to make fullscreen,hd,annnd control panel(and grand exchange if you can)

item.title: How to make fullscreen,hd,annnd control panel(and grand exchange if you can)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:5, topic:391618”]dude just find a 562 with ge…some 562’s has ge+ control panel and they always (or should) have hd
or somehow make a 317 a 562 hd which i dont think is possible[/quote]it isn’t possible lol

My thoughts on topic:

You can get the fullscreen just study runelimited client and build off of that.

hd is not possible in a 317 sadly. Best you could do is update teh cache as much as possible.

Grand Exchange is possible but takes a very experienced coder to add it.

There is a control panel guide somewhere on mopar use the search button lol

Read full topic

item.title: How to make fullscreen,hd,annnd control panel(and grand exchange if you can)
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

umm, grand exchange in 317? I don’t tihnk so LOL. Graphics, eh… I guess you can make them better but they wont be HD.
And as far as the control panel, that is possible, but pretty difficult. Full screen, I believe you can do that.
Anyways, good luck. lol I have no idea how to do any of those except making a control panel.

Read full topic
